problem_names:
lemma makeCArrayCorrect:
  "index < arraySize ==>
   readCArray (makeCArray arraySize fillValue) index = fillValue"

lemma writeCArrayCorrect1:
  "readCArray (writeCArray array index value) index = value"

lemma writeCArrayCorrect2:
  "index1 ~= index2 ==>
   readCArray (writeCArray array index1 value) index2 = 
   readCArray array index2"
translations:
lemma makeCArrayCorrect:
  "index < arraySize ==>
   readCArray (makeCArray arraySize fillValue) index = fillValue"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. index < arraySize \<Longrightarrow>
    readCArray (makeCArray arraySize fillValue) index = fillValue

lemma writeCArrayCorrect1:
  "readCArray (writeCArray array index value) index = value"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. readCArray (writeCArray array index value) index = value

lemma writeCArrayCorrect2:
  "index1 ~= index2 ==>
   readCArray (writeCArray array index1 value) index2 = 
   readCArray array index2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. index1 \<noteq> index2 \<Longrightarrow>
    readCArray (writeCArray array index1 value) index2 =
    readCArray array index2
